page.title: 03FARMING AND FERTILLIZERS.
page.content: Until about 20 years ago farmers used very little fertilizer.Lots of cow manure and horse manure were used. The fertilizers that were used were basic slag and sulphate of ammonia which were by products of steel furnace.Not very much of these two were used.Now we use many nitrogen phosphate & potash mixtures for different crops such as corn and grass. All these fertilizers come from oil nowadays.We also get sprays now to kill weeds in corn like daisies,docks & thistles also to kill insects like leather jackets,aphids.And we get sprays to kill fungus diseases on the leaves of the barley & other corn but we still use lots of cow manure.
